ABOUT US

Comex(Beijing) Mechanical & Electrical Equipment Co. Ltd.

Comex(Beijing) Mechanical & Electrical Equipment Co. Ltd. is a specialty manufacturer of filter presses, having obtained both ISO9001:2000 quality cerificate and ISO14001:2004 envireonment certificate. KMAZ type mud water treatment system produced by Comex is based on imported foreign advanced technology in combination of actual conditions in various industries in China. Comex has researched and developed systematic equipments applicable to solid-liquid filtration field.

Our Services

Slurry Separation Process

Very effective in dealing with clay blocks and meshes. Never get stuck. Featuring large processing capacity. Simple design, Low cost for operation and maintenance.

Slurry Management System

The system consists of fresh slurry manufacture tank, fresh slurry pump, fresh slurry storage tank, CMC agitating tank, CMC agitator, CMC pump, CMC storage tank, valve, etc.

Filter-press Process

Main oil cylinder drives mobile plate to close allfilter chambers. By using hydraulically driven membrane pump, slurry is filled into filter chamber formed by two adjacent filter plates.

Our Products

Mud water filtration equipment

Clay-slurry separator

When clay is treated by using traditional process,slag water contentt is really high and uneasy to transport, which easily lead to environmental pollution.

Dewatering screen

Dewatering screen is divided into single stage dewatering screen and second stage dewatering screen in single and double layer.

Coarse screen

Adopts highly frequency vibrator of famous international brand, are under variable frequency control.

Vibrator

Achieve self-synchronizing to demand various processing equipment as a multiple stage combination.

Slurry preparation & conditioning equipment

The need for mud preparation and conditioning

Mud water blanced shield machine is widely used due to its advantages like good construction quality, high efficiency, advanced technology and safety & reliability.

Quality mud slurry preparation and conditioning method

Producing quality mud slurry calls for very high slurry preparation material, such as clay. It is a must to use bentonitic as main slurry preparation material which is small for sand content, water loss rate and gravity and high slurry producing capacity and colloid rate.

Reasonable configuration of slurry preparation facility

A well configuration of slurry preparation facility provides actually another important method to supply quality mud slurry for shield machine construction.

Mud slurry conditioning method

Geological conditions influence significantly shield machine consttruction. Itis a must to condition old slurry frequently.

Earth filtration equipment

Swirler

Single stage swirl and second stage swirl is made of imported abrasion resistant material with high abrasion performance and low maintenace cost. Single stage swirl and second stage swirl can be used respectively according to actual application.

Control System

All motors are attached with independent voltage and current display with recorder, recording in a real time basis all using status and information.

Technical parameters of MTP type mud water separator

The design parameters are :- Clay-slurry separator, Coarse screen, Dewatering screen, First stage swirl, Second stage swirl.

Filter press

Material feeding of membrane pump

Use hydraulic drive and share same power source with main machine without need of additional power drive. Compared to common slag pump, it saves 70% of power.

Combined type filter plate

For filter plate, it is made of steel for itts main structure, polyurethane for dewatering segmentt. It absorbs rigidty of steel and dewatering performance of polyurethane.

Membrane type filter plate

Stable and reliable structure. Diaphragm life is more than 3 years. Diaphragm and filter board are split favoring simple replacementt and low cost.

Operational principle and process of filter press

Main hydraulic cylinder activates, has crank mobile plate, press tightly all filter plates for forming a filter chamber between two adacent filter plates.

With good reputation until now, Comex product APN series filter press is honored to get

authentication of ISO 9001:2008 Quality Certification System.
